General.Name: Amot Investments Ltd
General.Description: Amot Investments, Ltd. is a real estate investment manager. The firm invests in real estate markets of Israel. Its properties include central bus stations, commercial centers, supermarkets, banks, and other commercial areas. Amot Investments, Ltd. is based in Ramat-gan, Israel. Amot Investments Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of Alony Hetz Properties & Investments Ltd.
General.Address: Amot Atrium Tower, Ramat Gan, Israel, 5250501
